name: ContactPerson
description: A contact person within an organization - extends Person with role and organizational context

properties.name: role
properties.description: Role or position of the contact person in the organization

properties.name: department
properties.description: Department or division within the organization

properties.name: isPrimary
properties.description: Whether this is the primary contact for the organization

properties.name: contactPurpose
properties.description: Purpose of contact (billing, technical, administrative, sales, support, emergency)

properties.name: preferredContactMethod
properties.description: Preferred method of contact (email, phone, sms)
